description:
The forces within Globe begin to panic after Hana activates the Blume.  Nishikubo tells Daichi about the plan to take out the Planetary Gears` fortress carrier Oberon, operation Summer.  All members of the Plantary Gears gather, and plan their next move.  A new kiltgang is heading for Earth.  It is stopped by Hana in the Flare Engine.
Source: crunchyroll
